headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Show your patriotic side by taking 50% off Independence Day instruments of destruction, customizations and fireworks. Including, the Vapid Liberator, Western Sovereign and Firework Launcher. Plus, all players can pick up the USA parachute bag from any Ammu-nation totally gratis and there are discounts on vehicles:

- Vapid Winky – 30% off
- Dinka Veto Classic – 30% off
- Albany Roosevelt Valor – 40% off
- MTL Fire Truck – 30% off

And More! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
